text: Wow Wow Veggies!
Johnny, you really like your veggies, don’t you?
Err..ummm…ya…yes.
I don’t like them.
Well, she must be feeling really bad
Who?
Miss Bean!
Miss Bean!
Why are you sad?

Oh Bob, no one is eating me,
So I am really sad and gloomy.

I am sorry Miss Bean
But I don’t like anything green.
But kids, vegetables are good for you. Right Johnny?
Err…ummm…..yes.

Miss Bean, Mr. Carrot and Mr. Pea,
Please really do tell me

What do you have to say,
Are you dull and boring or happy and gay?

We are red, we are green
We are the best you have seen.

Not just good, we are great
We are pasta’s bestest mate.
We would love to know more about you.
Would’nt we kids?

I am green and shiny and kinda long
I can make you good & strong

A great source of protein
That’s me, Miss Bean!
I think I like you Miss Bean.

In a pod, I do live
I have so much to give

High on fiber, I am Mr. Pea
Mashed or boiled, just eat me.
Mmmm…I never thought you were this delicious, Mr. Pea.
I would like to do a dance for you but I need my partner.
Where is your partner?
Under the table where Johnny has put his vegetables

Johnny Johnny?
Are these your veggies?
Err.ya.yes.
I really do feel bad for them now.
I am sorry I lied. Here is your partner Mr. Carrot.
Brace up for an awesome performance.

I am red and yummy
I can soothe your tummy.

I do wonders for your eyes,
Lift your hands for hi fives!
Thank you, my dear veggies.
Kids, how do you find our friends?
Veggies are totally Wow!
So, do you think veggies are boring?
Noooooo!
I think veggies are awesome!
They belong in my stomach, not under the table.
So, are you all ready to make friends with the veggies on your plate? .
I totally hope so.
Have a wonderful day filled with joy, laughter and learning!
See you soon.
